Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/63rd
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th & California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th, then resume their normal route on California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Cicero
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available from Pulaski to Austin to provide service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, 7# Harrison, #54 Cicero, #126 Jackson or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Flournoy
ShortDescription: Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Flournoy Laramie, Lexington and Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Flournoy Laramie, Lexington and Cicero : due to, street blockage near Cicero/Flournoy

Northbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Maplewood
ShortDescription: #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Western, Jackson, California and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Western, Jackson, California and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Maplewood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays Boarding change between Grand and Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/delays due to a track condition between Grand and Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/delays due to a track condition between Grand and Damen.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Grand and Damen stations.

Board/exit all trains on the Forest Park-bound side of the platform at Grand, Chicago, Division and Damen.
We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
